Performance information\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Legitimate interest of EPAM, EPAM's affiliates or other third parties that clearly overrides the interest of the employee. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThe processing of such personal data may otherwise take place if the conditions laid down for the processing of sensitive personal data are satisfied, cf. Section 8(5), cf. Section 7 in the Danish Data Protection Act.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rIntroducing and conducting employment policy allowing to reduce the risk related to:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"loss of property of EPAM and EPAM customer\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"unlawful disclosure of legally protected information\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"causing other significant damage to EPAM or EPAM customer\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"prevention of fraud or any kind of deception\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Where the processing of your personal data is based on your consent, you have a right to withdraw such consent at any time. However, this will not affect the lawfulness of processing based on your consent before its withdrawal. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The basis for you providing personal information and special categories of personal data partly comes from a statutory requirement, partly from a contractual requirement under your employment contract, and partly from a need for the information to carry out the employment relationship with you. In general, you must provide the personal data and special categories of personal data, except when we indicate that certain information is voluntary (e.g., in connection with employee satisfaction surveys). Not providing your personal data and special categories of personal data may prevent EPAM from carrying out the employment relationship with you and, in some circumstances, may require EPAM to terminate your employment. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
